_header: This sinful man in deed and thought
Subjects: debates, between angels and devils; devil; usury
_description: Warnings or promises of four demons and four angels, in a Latin didactic treatise

OxfMagd60.Transcription:

                    dedepeynes of helle shall be his medehe þouȝt yn synne both
                    day and nyȝttherfore he shall be yn helle and that ys
